title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: CIDOB Apr 02 2025 · Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. title: Josep Borrell, nou president del CIDOB
snippet: L’ex-ministre espanyol Josep Borrell serà el nou president del think tank Centre d’Estudis i Documentació Internacionals a Barcelona (CIDOB), en substitució de l’historiador Antoni Segura. Així ho ha decidit el patronat de la institució, quan només fa uns dies que Borrell va deixar ...

title: Borrell debuts as President of the CIDOB think tank
snippet: Josep Borrell, former Spanish Minister of Foreign Affairs and former High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, took office this Wednesday as President of CIDOB, the Barcelona-based think tank specializing ...
